document_data.name: Naeryndroth
document_data.mainbody: '''Naeryndroth''' was an [[Dragon aging|adult]] [[black dragon]] and one of the "overdragons" of [[Melabrauth]] in [[Laerakond]] as of [[1479 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Naeryndroth was cunning and able to deceive many foes with his acting skills.
